original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady, rupee at 313/50 against the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at open on Monday and the rupee opened at 313/313.50 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 28.00/30 percent, steady from 28.10/25 percent at Friday’s close.
The rupee opened at 313.00/50 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 313.10/40. (Colombo/May15/2023)
